content: fasten_off 8 times total 32 total sts change to light and weave in ends see picture 2 yellow yarn slip_stitch in next st page 3 3 4 crown leaves notes with 3 25 mm hook and green yarn round 1 join green yarn in the first front loop created from round 26 working in flo *slip_stitch in next front loop chain 8 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next chain st half_double_crochet in next chain st double_crochet in next 4 chain sts skip next front loop slip_stitch in next front loop repeat from * 8 times total round 2 working in flo from round 27 *slip_stitch in next front loop chain 11 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next chain st half_double_crochet in next 2 chain sts double_crochet in next 6 chain sts skip next front loop slip_stitch in next front loop repeat from * 6 times total round 3 working in flo from round 28 *slip_stitch in next front loop chain 14 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 2 chain sts half_double_crochet in next 3 chain sts double_crochet in next 7 chain sts skip next front loop slip_stitch in next front loop repeat from * 4 times total fasten_off and weave in ends see picture 3 smaller pineapple version in picture 4 is made with dk weight yarn a 2 75 mm hook and 7 mm safety eyes it measures 6 inches tall by 3 1/4 inches wide page 4
